thread.title: Latest Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8+ leak reveals colour options and pricing
thread.title_full: Latest Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8+ leak reveals colour options and pricing

title: Latest Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8+ leak reveals colour options and pricing
text:
Latest Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8+ leak reveals colour options and pricing Latest Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8+ leak reveals colour options and pricing By - March 20, 2017 “The Galaxy S8 series will be available in Black Sky, Orchid Grey and Arctic Silver hues, at least initially” 
Samsung is all set to launch the Galaxy S8 and Galaxy S8+ smartphones on March 29th, but that hasn’t put a stop to the leaks. Last week, a report revealed key details regarding the camera features of the upcoming Samsung flagships. Now new details regarding the colour options and European pricing have also surfaced, thanks to tipster Evan Blass. Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8 Plus (top to bottom) in black sky, orchid grey and arctic silver (left to right) pic.twitter.com/ISo7W10sYV — Evan Blass (@evleaks) March 19, 2017 
Blass has posted press renders of various colour options of the Galaxy S8 and S8+, including Black Sky, Orchid Grey and Arctic Silver. Interestingly, as per the renders, Samsung has decided to go with a black front fascia for these colour variants of the Galaxy S8 and S8+. It’s quite possible that some other colour options could be available sy the launch. 
Coming to the pricing, the Blass suggests that the Samsung Galaxy S8’s price will start at €799 (~Rs 56,200), while the Galaxy S8+ will start at €899 (~Rs 63,260). The tipster also suggests that there will be an optional DeX accessory for the new Galaxy phones for €150 (~Rs 10,500), which is expected to allow the phones to be used as a desktop by connecting to a monitor. Facebook Comments
